name: Ruana Agua
descriptionES: Ruana cerrada y corta tejida a mano en lana de oveja con hilos en tonos azules.
descriptionEN: Closed and short Ruana woven by hand in sheep's wool with threads in shades of blue.
caresES: No lavar en lavadora. No usar colorante. No lavar en seco.
caresEN: Do not wash in washing machine. Do not use dye. Do not dry clean.
